message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about building a reordering system for statistical machine translation, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of machine learning techniques, such as the Moses toolkit, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of metrics to evaluate the performance of the system, which could place it under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper mentions the use of a chart decoder, which is a technique commonly used in neural networks, suggesting that it could also belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
